text: The Van is a 1977 American teen comedy movie directed by Sam Grossman and stars Stuart Getz, Danny DeVito, Deborah White, Harry Moses, Bill Adler. It was distributed by Crown International Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 comedy movies Category:1970s teen movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:American independent movies Category:1970s independent movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Teen sex comedy movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: The Van (1977 movie)
